properties.directives:
set-column stateTransition_subscriptionId SERV_NUM
set-column stateTransition_internalSubscriptionId SERV_NUM
set-column :stateTransition_originalSubscriptionId exp:{if (SOURCE_SYS == "ARBOR" && BUSINESS_LN.substring(0,4) =~ ["900 ","910 ","920 ","930 "]) {SERV_NUM_ORIG} else {SERV_NUM_EXT}}
set-column stateTransition_fromStatusCode '*NA'
set-column TF_EXTRACT_DATE empty(TF_EXTRACT_DATE)? '19000101' : TF_EXTRACT_DATE

set-type :TF_EXTRACT_DATE string
parse-as-fixed-length :TF_EXTRACT_DATE 4,2,2
merge :TF_EXTRACT_DATE_1 :TF_EXTRACT_DATE_2 :year_month '-'
merge :year_month :TF_EXTRACT_DATE_3 :stateTransition_lastModifiedDate '-'
parse-as-simple-date :stateTransition_lastModifiedDate yyyy-MM-dd
set-column SubscriptionStatusHistory_source SOURCE_SYS
set-column :FLG_SERVICE_STATUS_ACTIVE_DEACTIVE exp:{if (SERVICE_STATUS == 'AC') {FLG_SERVICE_STATUS_ACTIVE_DEACTIVE=1;} else {if (SERVICE_STATUS == 'DE' ) {FLG_SERVICE_STATUS_ACTIVE_DEACTIVE=0}}}
set-column :FLG_DEACT_REACT exp:{if  ( REACTIVATION_DATE == DEACTIVATION_DATE ) {FLG_DEACT_REACT=1;} else {FLG_DEACT_REACT=0;} }
set-column :FLG_ACT exp:{if  ( !(empty(SERVICE_START_DATE)) && !(empty(ACTIVATION_REASON))) {FLG_ACT=1;} else {FLG_ACT=0;} }
set-column :FLG_DEACT exp:{if  ( !(empty(DEACTIVATION_DATE)) && !(empty(DEACTIVATION_REASON))) {FLG_DEACT=1;} else {FLG_DEACT=0;} }
set-column :FLG_REACT  exp:{if  ( !(empty(REACTIVATION_DATE)) && !(empty(ACTIVATION_REASON))) {FLG_REACT=1;} else {FLG_REACT=0;} }
set-column :FLG_HOT_LINE  exp:{if  ( !(empty(HOT_LINE_DATE)) && !(empty(HOT_LINE_REASON))) {FLG_HOT_LINE=1;} else {FLG_HOT_LINE=0;} }
set-column :FLG_INIT_PAYMENT   exp:{if  ( !(empty(INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE) )) {FLG_INIT_PAYMENT=1;} else {FLG_INIT_PAYMENT=0;} }


set-column SERVICE_START_DATE empty(SERVICE_START_DATE)? '19000101' : SERVICE_START_DATE
set-column REACTIVATION_DATE empty(REACTIVATION_DATE)? '19000101' : REACTIVATION_DATE
set-column HOT_LINE_DATE empty(HOT_LINE_DATE)? '19000101' : HOT_LINE_DATE
set-column DEACTIVATION_DATE empty(DEACTIVATION_DATE)? '19000101' : DEACTIVATION_DATE
set-column INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE empty(INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE)? '19000101' : INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE

set-column SERVICE_START_DATE_TEMP SERVICE_START_DATE
set-column REACTIVATION_DATE_TEMP REACTIVATION_DATE
set-column HOT_LINE_TEMP HOT_LINE_DATE
set-column DEACTIVATION_DATE_TEMP DEACTIVATION_DATE
set-column INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE_TEMP INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE

set-type :SERVICE_START_DATE string
parse-as-fixed-length :SERVICE_START_DATE 4,2,2
merge :SERVICE_START_DATE_1 :SERVICE_START_DATE_2 :year_month '-'
drop :SERVICE_START_DATE
merge :year_month :SERVICE_START_DATE_3 :SERVICE_START_DATE '-'
parse-as-simple-date :SERVICE_START_DATE yyyy-MM-dd

set-type :REACTIVATION_DATE string
parse-as-fixed-length :REACTIVATION_DATE 4,2,2
merge :REACTIVATION_DATE_1 :REACTIVATION_DATE_2 :year_month '-'
drop :REACTIVATION_DATE
merge :year_month :REACTIVATION_DATE_3 :REACTIVATION_DATE '-'
parse-as-simple-date :REACTIVATION_DATE yyyy-MM-dd

set-type :HOT_LINE_DATE string
parse-as-fixed-length :HOT_LINE_DATE 4,2,2
merge :HOT_LINE_DATE_1 :HOT_LINE_DATE_2 :year_month '-'
drop :HOT_LINE_DATE
merge :year_month :HOT_LINE_DATE_3 :HOT_LINE_DATE '-'
parse-as-simple-date :HOT_LINE_DATE yyyy-MM-dd

set-type :DEACTIVATION_DATE string
parse-as-fixed-length :DEACTIVATION_DATE 4,2,2
merge :DEACTIVATION_DATE_1 :DEACTIVATION_DATE_2 :year_month '-'
drop :DEACTIVATION_DATE
merge :year_month :DEACTIVATION_DATE_3 :DEACTIVATION_DATE '-'
parse-as-simple-date :DEACTIVATION_DATE yyyy-MM-dd

set-type :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE string
parse-as-fixed-length :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE 4,2,2
merge :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE_1 :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE_2 :year_month '-'
drop :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE
merge :year_month :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE_3 :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE '-'
parse-as-simple-date :INITIAL_PAYMENT_DATE yyyy-MM-dd

#pragma load-directives parse-as-csv-multi;
parse-as-csv-multi :body '|;|' true
drop body
filter-row-if-true offset == 0
drop offset
